abstract: Louisiana National Guard commanders say four guard members who died in helicopter crash near Gulf Coast had multiple deployments to war zones and long record of responding to hurricanes, floods and oil spills; identifies four as George Wayne Griffin, George David Strother, Lance Bergeron and Thomas Florich.
lead_paragraph: The four men had several deployments to war zones and a long record of responding to hurricanes, floods and oil spills, Guard commanders said Monday.

headline.main: National Guard Praises Record of 4 Who Died in Helicopter Crash
headline.print_headline: Guard Praises Record of 4 Who Died in Helicopter

snippet: The four men had several deployments to war zones and a long record of responding to hurricanes, floods and oil spills, Guard commanders said Monday.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
